column3: Emissions of all greenhouse gases resulting from stationary and mobile energy activities including fuel combustion and fugitive fuel emissions, and non-energy use of fossil fuels.
Emissions resulting from industrial processes and product use of greenhouse gases.
Emissions from agricultural activities except fuel combustion, which is addressed under Energy.

column2: Land Use, Land-Use Change, and Forestry
column3: Emissions and removals of CO2, and emissions of CH4, and N2O from land use, land-use change and forestry.
